Name: Fiery rage
Description: For each monster affected by Ignite, you earn {OtherValues[0]}% additionnal critical rate.
This effect can provide a maximum bonus of {OtherValues[1]}% additionnal critical rate.

Name: Wind Spirit
Description: When activated by the <<Coup d'bambou>>, the Wind Spirit applies <<Status[0]>> to you or an ally, in {OtherValues[0]} radius units.

Name: Soul Mate
Description: When activated by summoning a pet <<PassiveSummonerNeutral>> change and become an another passive depend on the pet , the Soul Mate applies <<Status[0]>> to you, in {OtherValues[0]} radius units.

Name: Mono Soul Mate
Description: When activated by summoning a pet Mono dps <<PetMonoSpell>>, the Soul Mate applies <<Status[0]>> to you, in {OtherValues[0]} radius units.

Name: AOE Soul Mate
Description: When activated by summoning a pet AOE dps <<PetAOESpell>>
the Soul Mate applies <<Status[0]>> to you and itself, in {OtherValues[0]} radius units.

Name: Support Soul Mate
Description: When activated by summoning a pet support <<PetSupportSpell>>, the Soul Mate applies <<Status[0]>> to you, in {OtherValues[0]} radius units.
